Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to the conveyance of certain real property for open space, parks, or historic preservation purposes
Summary: Exempts the conveyance of real property for open space, parks, or historic preservation purposes to any not-for-profit tax exempt corporation operated for conservation, environmental, parks or historic preservation purposes from the state real estate transfer tax and the additional tax on real estate transfers of residential real property where the consideration is one million dollars or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exemptions for any not-for-profit tax exempt corporation operated for conservation, environmental, parks or historic preservation purposes
